parameters.name: AddinCallbacks
parameters.description: Object that includes the add-in callback methods

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Add-in ID; this is the same Cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

title: ISldWorks.SetAddinCallbackInfo
signature:
System.Boolean SetAddinCallbackInfo( 
   System.Int32
ModuleHandle
,
   System.Object
AddinCallbacks
,
   System.Int32
Cookie
)

parameters.name: AddinCallbacks
parameters.description: Object that includes the add-in callback methods

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Add-in ID; this is the same Cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

returns: True if the add-in callback commands are set, false if if not
